group_1.narration: After a few weeks, Kaede, Rena, and I started @going to and from school together every day.
Today, I'm waiting at the front gate @for Rena, who's late from her after-school duties, @and Kaede, who's in another grade.

group_1.textCenter: (I was worried about school, but thankfully @I made friends after all...)
(Still, I wonder...when will they get here?)
Gaaah, I don't get today's homework at aaalll...

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe we should have a study session @at home together?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, we can hang out at my place! @I made some pastries yesterday.

group_1.textCenter: Really?! Yaaaay! I love you, Leila!

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, Mito! You can't just go hugging me @so suddenly like that!

group_1.textRight: ...I get the feeling we won't get a lot @of studying done today.

group_1.textCenter: (They look like good friends... @A study group, huh? It sounds fun.)

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Good work today.]@[textBlack:I hope your classes have wrapped up by now.]@[textBlack:I apologize in advance, but...]@[textBlack:Could you do me a small favor?]
[textBlack:We have a group of guests coming to]@[textBlack:Mikazuki from a place called Kirimine Town,]@[textBlack:but we don't have enough food,]@[textBlack:so could you please get some groceries?]

group_1.textRight: Sorry I'm late, Iroha! @Were you waiting for me?

group_1.textCenter: I grabbed her on my way here, but she's a real @slowpoke, so...

group_1.textRight: Hey! You're sure don’t wait to blame things @on everyone else!

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha... It's fine...
Wow, so you got a bunch of guests coming over.

group_1.textRight: Since we don’t know where that town is, @it must be pretty far away, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, according to the phone call, @they come from deep in the mountains.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eep!

group_1.textLeft: Someone's screaming...?!
Something might've happened.@Let's go check it out!

group_1.textCenter: Gah, I'm SUCH a moron...!@What have I done?!

group_1.textRight: Something’s going on over there… @Momoko?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? Ah...Rena?
You know her, Rena?

group_1.textRight: Oh, uh, yeah...
That's Momoko, a fellow idol stan I met @at a promo event.
We're not geeky nerd buddies or anything @like that…
But we both go to the same school, @and she's easy to talk to.
We've exchanged merchandise @a few times, and...
...Whatever. What were you yelling about?

group_1.textLeft: ...Aah! Don't remind me! @The embarrassment'll kill me!

group_1.textRight: Eh, erm, ah... I feel like we're making a scene...
In that case...why don't we head over @to that park?
...Alright, have you calmed down some?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, aaah... Yeah, sorry. I'm better now.

group_1.textRight: So what happened?

group_1.textLeft: Well...I told you there was a guy in my class @who I liked, right?

group_1.textRight: Right.

group_1.textLeft: I was walking home with him just now.
We were chit-chattin' about stuff and we got @into talking about love.
And then...he asked me if there was @someone I liked.
I kinda panicked.
It all went slippin' out of my mouth and I said, @"YOU, you dummy!!"
Once we went separate ways and things @settled down...
...All the embarrassment went and hit me @all at once!

group_1.textRight: Hang on just a second! Aren't you skipping over @the most important part?!
...So how did it go?

group_1.textLeft: How...?

group_1.textRight: The confession, duh! How'd it turn out?!

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh yeah, we're goin' out now.

group_1.textRight: Mmmmm...!
You colossal idiot! That's amazing news! @Ah, jeez, I got all worried over nothing!

group_1.textLeft: But I wanted to give him an actual confession!
It's, like...I should've been brave enough @to tell him outright!
Moments like those, you gotta bare your heart @to its fullest!

group_1.textRight: But you're a girl! What are you trying to prove?
Whatever! Aren't you happy with how things @turned out?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]Yeah.
Ah, I'm goin’ out with the guy I like...!

group_1.textRight: Exactly! What were you acting like that for?! @You should be way happier about it!

group_1.textLeft: Talkin' to you's really helped me calm down. @Thanks for hearin' me out!
Erm...sorry for draggin' you guys into this, too...

group_1.textRight: I mentioned Iroha Tamaki before, right?@The new girl sitting next to me?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, so you're the transfer student! @Nice to meetcha!

group_1.textRight: Yes, it's nice to meet you, too!

group_1.textLeft: And this is Kaede...what's your last name again?

group_1.textRight: Jeez, Rena, you're so mean!

group_1.narration: From there we all introduced ourselves@to each other, and at Rena's suggestion,@we decided to celebrate Momoko's @romantic success.

group_1.textRight: Where should we celebrate? Maybe a diner?

group_1.textLeft: I've got a place in mind, if you guys are @okay with it!
I saw it once, but it was so cute I couldn't @bring myself to just walk in...
But we're all here today,
and I'm going out with the guy I like now, @so I gotta be brave!

group_1.textRight: What kind of restaurant do you need @bravery for...?

group_1.textLeft: You'll just have to wait and see!

group_1.textRight: (Oh... What should I do about the groceries...?)
(Yachiyo said it wasn't urgent, so I'll@let her know I'll buy them on my way home.)
